author: petrucci4prez
name: CinnXP-Royale
description:
For all those liking this venerable almost-decade-and-a-half-old interface, here is another WinXP clone :)

This the Royale flavor; I also maintain the Luna flavor

Based on Mint-XP (fmcgorenc) and Adwaita

Includes cinnamon, gtk2, gtk3, metacity, and cursor themes (all optimized to run on Linux Mint 17.x)

See README on github for install instructions

NOTE: To fully use this theme it must be manually installed. Please do not try to install from within Linux Mint (using Settings>Themes>Desktop>Add/Remove Desktop Themes>Available Themes (online)). The Mint auto-installer does not know how to deal with icon files so theme will not fully install with this method.

Changelog:

v1.0.2 - optimizations, split from the original luna theme (04-22-2016)
